name: YouTube - Better Full Dark Theme 2019 (ARC)
description: - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ★Installation guide *CLICK* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ★Problem fix guide *CLICK* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ★Restore old layout guide *CLICK* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ►Please use "Customize Settings" to select layout. Options with "⚠" are important to install theme properly. ►For new layout please enable dark theme in YT settings first, and select option ⚠2 to "ON". To have dark theme permanently even after clearing cookies, select ⚠2 to "OFF", but it may be bugged/glitchy for some browsers. Think about it! And don't blame. ►If you have any problem there guides above! ►Report bugs with screenshot and without rating please..
obsoletion_message: Style no longer works on site.  - Thats not true.
additional_info: ►Theme for YT player *here* ~Google analytics won't be themed.. -------------------------------------------------------------------------- -video edit and subtitles ~coming soon -themed search box list (new layout) ~coming soon -------------------------------------------------------------------------- Version 1.05 Final (update 79) -fixing what have to be fixed Version 1.05 Final (update 77) -little player fixes -fixed always dark mode -fixes, fixes and improvements Version 1.05 Final (update 76) -fixed margins -some improvements Version 1.05 Final (update 75) New layout: -fixed 2k and up resolutions display Version 1.05 Final (update 66-74) -archived Version 1.05 Final (update 65) New layout: -fixed underline on add coment and search on channel -themed community -fixed search background Version 1.05 Final (update 64) New layout: -fixed unavaiable live chat size and color Version 1.05 Final (update 63) New layout: -fixed colors for sponsored comments on live chat -fixed search bar white areas Version 1.05 Final (update 62) Old and New layout: -fixed white buttons and areas Version 1.05 Final (update 61) Old and New layout: -updated live chat colors Version 1.05 Final (update 60) Old and New layout: -added red color accent -fixed missing colors -fixed black text and white backgrounds in settings -fixed wrong color when hover on category text Version 1.05 Final (update 59) Old and New layout: -live chat colors fixed Version 1.05 Final (update 58) New layout: -size and position of columns fixed Version 1.05 Final (update 57) -added fix for wide old layout in customization ⚠1 Version 1.05 Final (update 56) New layout: -fixed bugs after youtube changes -fixed colors -fixed some windows position Version 1.05 Final (update 55) General: -some color corrections -color accent improvements New layout: -fixed movie author and verified account colors Version 1.05 Final (update 54) -now you can select color accent for both layouts Version 1.05 Final (update 53) Old layout: -fixed superchat colors -minor improvements Version 1.05 Final (update 52) New layout: -patched unthemed areas -themed comments history Player: -you can now select full screen progress bar position -fixed progress bar scrubber shape on full screen Version 1.05 Final (update 51) -You can use now this style for new layout without enabling dark theme, just choose it in customization. Version 1.05 Final (update 50) New layout: -fixed comments -fixed description -fixed video cut off on theater mode -improved playlist -now you can choose font size of comments&description Version 1.05 Final (update 49) -some minor improvements to new layout -rounded avatar fix (new layout) -video description text improvements (new layout) -movie shop, and description colors fixed Version 1.05 Final (update 48) -searching color fixed -live chat color fix Version 1.05 Final (update 47) -updated reporting tool colors Version 1.05 Final (update 46) -removed little unnecessary padding in new layout -new installation guide video Version 1.05 Final (update 45) -audio library colors updated Version 1.05 Final (update 44) -you can set transparency in advanced settings of outro videos Two years birthday! Version 1.05 Final (update 43) -fixed playlist bottom spacing (new layout) Version 1.05 Final (update 42) -live chat width fixed (new layout) -black emoticons section color fixed Version 1.05 Final (update 41) -all browser checked, working fine Version 1.05 Final (update 40) -fixed notification text color of video processing -fixed comment bubble backgroud and arrow in video edit -changed button 'enable subtitles' underline color, from red to blue Version 1.05 Final (update 39) -creators studio little improvements -patching unthemed areas (new and old layout) -playlist color fixed (new layout) -autoplay button themed (new layout) -video owner badge fixed (new layout) Version 1.05 Final (update 38) -new layout patched -minor fixes Version 1.05 Final (update 37) -new layout fixes Version 1.05 Final (update 36) -updated new layout and fixed playlist position -fixed hover bugs in channel -fixed "show more" text position -minor improvements Version 1.05 Final (update 35) -live chat themed again after YT changed code Version 1.05 Final (update 34) -patched some unthemed areas -updated music library colors -translation section themed -video editor tools themed -show more button fixed -player full screen improved Version 1.05 Final (update 33) -updated new layout colors Version 1.05 Final (update 32) -updated new layout theme Version 1.05 Final (update 31) theme for new layout included *you can select new layout theme (in advanced setting) Version 1.05 Final (update 30) -mini theme for new layout (if u like new with night mode enabled) Version 1.05 Final (update 29) -fixing mess, after youtube changes -fixed player and colors -and more.. Version 1.05 Final (update 28) -youtube changes hotfixes Version 1.05 Final (update 27) -added new monetize font color in creators studio -fixed white line in monetize section -ending cards are transparented now (less anoying and not covering movie) Version 1.05 Final (update 26) -notification panel hotfix Version 1.05 Final (update 25) -minor fixes and improvements Version 1.05 Final (update 24) -fixed rounded avatar in account change window, after youtube changes -fixed cropped text in video description in some languages -fixed text in comments section Version 1.05 Final (update 23) -little fix for video description Version 1.05 Final (update 22) -resume progress bar size and color changes Version 1.05 Final (update 21) -fixed white borders on scrollbar -fixed live chat time -fixed badges and season/episode numbers -finished live chat theme -fixed bugs Version 1.05 Final (update 20) -live chat themed (beta) -themed new areas -fixed search icon in history -fixed "comments history" section -fixed badges (NEW, HD, LIVE, CHANNEL) -fixed black arrow in the search results -temporary fixed "cannot monetize" icon position (broken by youtube) -changed color to blue on channel names in the search result Version 1.05 Final (update 19) -creators studio color changes -partner section themed -acount status themed -features themed -copyright notification themed -dolar symbol color fixed from the movie store Version 1.05 Final (update 18) -creators studio blue icons and color improvements -channels spacing fixed -show everything button fixed -little fixes Version 1.05 Final (update 17) -improved creators studio (blue icons in future) -"play all" button fixed Version 1.05 Final (update 16) [1 year birthday] -tested theme on many browsers - WORKING WELL -blue subscribe buttons -no more round avatars in notifications -fixed font colors Version 1.05 Final (update 15) -better movie description -fixed white borders on screen keyboard -scrollbar themed *chrome only for now* Version 1.05 Final (update 14b) -fixed 1px white line below thumbnails on firefox -notification text color fix -like and dislike colors fixed -copyright request colors fixed -translation icon themed -other color fixes Version 1.05 Final (update 14) -channel playlist fix Version 1.05 Final (update 13) -new author comment badge fix -other browsers now show theme version Version 1.05 Final (update 12) -verified icon fix Version 1.05 Final (update 11) -chrome now is showing theme version -little fixes Version 1.05 Final (update 10) -fixed uploading section Version 1.05 Final (update 09) -minor fix Version 1.05 Final (update 08) -almost finished video editor Version 1.05 Final (update 07) -live chat themed (outdated) -minor fixes -patched unthemed areas -removed some of useless code Version 1.05 Final (update 06) -'play all' button fixed -themed white borders Version 1.05 Final (update 05) -blue player color included -font select Version 1.05 Final (update 04) -minor fixes for youtube changes Version 1.05 Final (update 03) -new comment window, color and height fix -avatars fix Version 1.05 Final (update 02) -patched unthemed areas -fixed youtube bugs - playlist edit buttons -hotfixes Version 1.05 Final (update 01) -fixed comment section colors -youtube changes - theme fixed Version 1.05 Final Upgrades ~library colors fix ~patched unthemed areas ~working on video editor Version 1.05 Final - finished 99,91% - finished audio library theme - fixed video like color on chrome - upgrades, fixes, improvements

discussions.name: Did youtube deleted the old theme?

style_setting_options.label: --I have old YT layout-- (or I will restore it)
ON - I will enable dark theme on YT (recommended)
OFF - Always dark (may be glitchy in Firefox)
Default position

Classic (normal)
Blue (full site)
Green (lite)
